title: Chocolate pecan tart
description: Impress the chocoholic in your life with chocolate shortcrust pastry filled with a rich chocolate and nut filling.For this recipe you will need a heavy, flat baking tray and a 25cm/10in fluted flan tin.
ingredients: 135g/4¾oz cold unsalted butter, cut into roughly 1cm/½in cubes
vanilla ice cream or double cream, to serve
